properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_GRADE , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , GENDER , AGE , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , QUIT_REASON , SELF_INTRODUCTION FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_GRADE , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , GENDER , AGE , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , QUIT_REASON , SELF_INTRODUCTION ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , '일반' , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , 'Y' , NULL , NULL )
SELECT count(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET NICKNAME = ? , SELF_INTRODUCTION = ? , EMAIL = ? , PHONE = ? , ADDRESS = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_GRADE , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , GENDER , AGE , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , QUIT_REASON , SELF_INTRODUCTION FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_GRADE , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , GENDER , AGE , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , QUIT_REASON , SELF_INTRODUCTION FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_GRADE , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , GENDER , AGE , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , QUIT_REASON , SELF_INTRODUCTION FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS ='N' WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET QUIT_REASON = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , UPLOAD_DATE , STATUS , CATEGORY ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , 'Y' , 'PROFILE' )
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND CATEGORY = 'PROFILE'
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND CATEGORY = 'PROFILE' AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_GRADE , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , GENDER , AGE , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , QUIT_REASON , SELF_INTRODUCTION FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = ?
